name: Mary Fuller
text: I like this place very much. theres a unique atmosphere. The food is great. the service is powerful and the team is courteous. The cost is modest. very much recommend.

name: syed aleemuddin
text: Love the taste, friendly staff!!

name: Randi Ayala
text: I order from this Pizza Hut all the time and I get good service but tonight the guy name josh was super nice and friendly while taking my order over the phone.  GREAT customer service Josh !!!!!! Thanks

name: Brent Mack
text: Unfortunately because of covid I could not go anywhere to get change for my $100 bill. After 5 years of ordering from pizza hut McFarland the manager said they could not deliver my order. Really?

name: jeff pickart
text: Ordered a pan of Pasta for 2 to a hotel in Madison. NO UTENSILS, NO PLATES, NO NAPKINS. COLD BREADSTICKS. Apparently we were supposed to eat it off the table with our fingers. Threw it out. $18 down the drain.

name: Douglas Cowgill
text: This spot always delivers. They have fresh food for affordable pricing, there no long wait even when the spot is packed.

name: Briana Roy
text: We always love Pizza Hut, but last weeks venture was extra great.  The delivery driver was very friendly.  Somehow my credit card got charged the wrong amount and they were trying to call me to let me know right away, however I had given an ‚Ä¶More

name: Elizabeth Blindauer
text: Worked with the manager john on a few orders now. Been a great guy. Knows his stuff and very respectful.

name: Jordan Marcellino
text: You get what you pay for. Pizza, of course. Not bad, but not great either.

name: paul anderson
text: They were very fast on the delivery, and the food was made perfect.   Thank you.

name: Rodney M
text: This spot never disappoints. They have fresh dishes for convenient pricing, there no long wait even when they are packed.

name: Lee Ann Crye
text: Awesome! Always fast and delicious!

name: Carmen Gilbert
text: They messed up our order, but made it up to us the next night, with free dinner!!

name: Jim Wetterau
text: ordered delivery from the McFarland Pizza Hut on a Sunday night (not the SuperBowl).  I had to call the order in because my address is new construction so it didn't come up for online ordering.  The young lady who answered the phone was ‚Ä¶More

name: Aderson Torres
text: Those first two are probably mad ex workers, I will tell you this,  this Pizza Hut  is like no other that I have been to. They make the pizza look exactly like the one on television, and let me say that is hard to copy. Perfect topping ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Langer
text: Their general manager is incredibly BAD. Doesn't handle things well, and cannot keep on schedule. Very lazy and never accepts the blame. He must always point the finger at someone else or tell others to do his dirty work. Because of this general manager I now hate this Pizza hut location. (It used to be the best!)

name: William D Harris
text: great pizza for a great price.

name: Kurt Grauvogl
text: The Mcfarland  pizza hut service and staff are always great

name: Free dom
text: Best pizza hut in Wisconsin. Great staff!!!

name: Evan Kania
text: The voice of Jeremy, warms my heart. Hes a good worker, Love the service buddy! Keep it up!

name: Mario McCullum
text: Quick delivery, pizza is hot upon arrival. Great prices!

name: Christopher Pollock
text: Definitely not friendly or helpful. Called 3 pizza huts before I finally found the closest one 5 miles away for delivery. Was told that they couldn't deliver to me and asked for an explanation and he said because they don't. I asked for the ‚Ä¶More

name: P Alvarez
text: Pizza was hot and fresh.  Ready for pickup when promised.  Online ordering is fast and easy.

name: Crazy Gamer
text: They have great food but when we had it delivered to are house they were a little slow

name: David Langston
text: Helpful crew and quality productüëç

name: Shannon Nachtmann
text: Quick, friendly, in and out. Same as usual

name: Kristina O'Connell
text: Love the food but the people are so rude, I have never meet a group of people who are so angry at the world

name: Bob s
text: Delivery is super fast, pizza is always screaming hot when they arrive. Store is pickup/delivery only.

name: Thomas Brewer
text: Awesome place

name: Trent Steffen
text: We just tried to get food at 11:40 he hung up on us because we were trying to figure out exactly what we wanted the call lasted 1 minute and 13 seconds and then told us he was gonna charge us full price (it was a discounted thing too) so we went there and he told us that we were taking forever and flipped us off at the drive thru.

name: Anne Michels
text: Great food and service

name: Erik Rathgaber
text: It's a super clean establishment.

name: Travis Smith
text:
Dude was a prick !
If your not in the mood for customers, then get out of the customer service industry!

name: Vicki
text: Pizza was over cooked, not real happy

name: jclc
text: Chicken taco pizza, yum!

name: J A
text: I eat here almost every day.

name: President of Auctionaire
text: Claimed that they didn't receive my online order and they were trying to sell me a mistake.

name: Evan Kania
text: Pizzahut, more like Pizzabutt!

name: Matt Pitzer
text: They delivered the wrong pizza to me, and they would not issue a refund. I had to wait another hour for them to deliver the pizza I ordered.

name: Gregory Granby
text: Processed death food. You'd be better off eating out of the garbage.

name: Greg Jacobs
text: I just a premo meat pizza very disappointed It tasted a day old.
